items.sentence: My grandfather died shortly after I was born.
Tom has never been willing to do that before.
At what age does the average Canadian retire?
Tell Tom I don't know what I should do first.
The last time I heard from Tom was last week.
Tom has completed the job that Mary gave him.
Tom stayed awake all night, thinking of Mary.
Tom and Mary have moved into their new house.
The dress Mary was wearing yesterday was red.
It was more difficult than I thought it'd be.
